basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around, flowering period May-June

maintenance.soil: Acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Need more fertilization, apply 1-2 times monthly, reduce fertilizers in winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove excessively grown, dead and disease branches timely
